metadata.synopsis: Wyll dialogue if he is an NPC and is in the goblin camp after attack on den victory. In paths where the attack has yet to begin, Wyll is enthusiastic for you to blow the horn and call for battle. After battle, you can recruit Wyll.

1.text: *You know this man's face - but you can't quite place it. He knows you too, judging from his quizzical expression.*
